Articles.Content: so im having this annoying issue with procedural wings where I cannot scale the damn wings, I can adjust the thickness but I cant scale them with mouseover r/t/g, I have far installed but I got the dll fix on page 92 of the forum section, and its still not working, i can provide a link to my gamedata folder and stuff if that helps
I suspect people will need your output log, and a full list of mods and their versions, it will likely be an outdated or missing dll file
